languages.text: Единица, носившая имя Авель Ханейманн, не последовала за Паскалем. Более ненужный своему амбициозному брату, он был отброшен и оставлен позади. Направляясь на станцию Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17, Авель оказался захвачен пиратами и обращен в техномата-невольника. День, когда ставший его тюрьмой пиратский корабль был уничтожен охотниками Имперского флота, положил конец его безмолвным мучениям.

The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.
languages.original_text: Единица, носившая имя Авель Ханейманн, не последовала за Паскалем. Более ненужный своему амбициозному брату, он был отброшен и оставлен позади. Направляясь на станцию Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17, Авель оказался захвачен пиратами и обращен в техномата-невольника. День, когда ставший его тюрьмой пиратский корабль был уничтожен охотниками Имперского флота, положил конец его безмолвным мучениям.

traits.locale_text: The unit bearing the name of Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. Not needed by his ambitious brother, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel got captured by pirates and turned into a prisoner technomat. The day when the pirate ship that became his prison got destroyed by the hunters of the Imperial Navy, put a stop to his silent torment.

The unit bearing the name of Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. Not needed by his ambitious brother, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel got captured by pirates and turned into a prisoner technomat. The day when the pirate ship that became his prison got destroyed by the hunters of the Imperial Navy, put a stop to his silent torment.

The unit bearing the name of Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and turned into a prisoner technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship of a prison marked the end of his silent torment.

The unit bearing the name of Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and turned into a prisoner technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship of a prison marked the end of his silent torment.

The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

languages.text: 名为亚伯·哈努曼的单位并没有追随帕斯卡，因为他那野心勃勃的同伴不再需要他，他被抛弃了。前往卡利西斯祭坛17号的途中，亚伯沦为了海盗的俘虏，被迫作为技工服务。直到帝国海军摧毁了他所在的海盗船，他的痛苦才终于结束。那一刻，他遭受的无声折磨终于迎来了终结。
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

traits.locale_text: 名为亚伯·哈努曼的单位并没有追随帕斯卡，因为他那野心勃勃的同伴不再需要他，他被抛弃了。前往卡利西斯祭坛17号的途中，亚伯沦为了海盗的俘虏，被迫作为囚徒技工服务。这样的痛苦直到帝国海军摧毁了他所在的海盗船才终于结束。那一刻，他遭受的无声折磨终于迎来了终结。

languages.text: Die Einheit mit dem Namen Abel Haneumann folgte Pasqal nicht. Da er von seinem ehrgeizigen Kameraden nicht mehr benötigt wurde, wurde er abgelegt und zurückgelassen. Auf dem Weg zu Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 wurde Abel von Piraten gefangen genommen und zur Zwangsarbeit als Technomat verdammt. Der Tag, an dem die imperiale Kriegsflotte sein Gefängnis in Form eines Piratenschiffs zerstörte, markierte das Ende seiner stummen Qualen.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

traits.locale_text: Die Einheit mit dem Namen Abel Haneumann folgte Pasqal nicht. Da er von seinem ehrgeizigen Kameraden nicht mehr benötigt wurde, wurde er abgelegt und zurückgelassen. Auf dem Weg zu Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 wurde Abel von Piraten gefangen genommen und in einen Gefangenen-Technomaten verwandelt. Der Tag, an dem die imperiale Kriegsflotte sein Gefängnis in Form eines Piratenschiffs zerstörte, markierte das Ende seiner stummen Qualen.

languages.text: L'unité du nom d'Abel Haneumann ne suivit pas Pasqal. Son ambitieux camarade n'ayant plus besoin de lui, il fut oublié et abandonné. Alors qu'il se rendait à la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel fut capturé par des pirates et condamné aux travaux forcés en tant que technomate. Son tourment silencieux prit fin le jour où la Marine Impériale détruisit le vaisseau pirate dans lequel il était emprisonné.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

traits.locale_text: L'unité du nom d'Abel Haneumann ne suivit pas Pasqal. Son ambitieux camarade n'ayant plus besoin de lui, il fut oublié et abandonné. Alors qu'il se rendait à la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel fut capturé par des pirates qui le transformèrent en technomate. Son tourment silencieux prit fin le jour où la Marine Impériale détruisit le vaisseau pirate dans lequel il était emprisonné.

languages.text: La unidad llamada Abel Haneumann no siguió a Pasqal. Ahora innecesario para su ambicioso camarada, fue rechazado y abandonado. Mientras viajaba a la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel cayó en manos de los piratas, que lo forzaron a trabajar como tecnómata. El día en que la Armada Imperial destruyó la nave que era su prisión marcó el fin de su tormento silencioso.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

traits.locale_text: La unidad llamada Abel Haneumann no siguió a Pasqal. Ahora innecesario para su ambicioso camarada, fue rechazado y abandonado. Mientras viajaba a la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel cayó en manos de los piratas, que lo retuvieron como tecnómata prisionero. El día en que la Armada Imperial destruyó la nave que era su prisión marcó el fin de su tormento silencioso.

languages.text: アベル・ヘニュマンの名を冠したユニットはパスカルの後を追わなかった。野心的な仲間に必要とされなくなった彼は捨てられ、取り残された。ステーション・アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17に向かう途中、アベルは海賊に捕らえられ、テクノマットとして働かされた。帝国海軍が刑務所の海賊船を破壊したその日、彼の静かな苦悩は終わりを告げた。
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

traits.locale_text: アベル・ヘニュマンの名を冠したユニットはパスカルの後を追わなかった。野心的な仲間に必要とされなくなった彼は捨てられ、取り残された。ステーション・アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17に向かう途中、アベルは海賊に捕らえられ、テクノマットとして働かされた。帝国海軍が刑務所の海賊船を破壊したその日、彼の静かな苦悩は終わりを告げた。

languages.text: Abel Haneumann ismini taşıyan birim, Pasqal'ı takip etmedi. Büyük hedefler peşindeki yoldaşı, artık ona ihtiyaç duymadığından onu bir kenara atıldı. Abel, Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyonuna giderken korsanların eline geçti ve bir teknomat olarak çalışmaya zorlandı. İmparatorluk Donanması'nın korsan gemisi hapishanesini yok ettiği gün, onun da sessiz ızdırabından kurtulduğu gün oldu.
languages.original_text: The unit bearing the name Abel Haneumann did not follow Pasqal. No longer needed by his ambitious comrade, he was discarded and left behind. While en route to station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, Abel was captured by pirates and forced to toil as a technomat. The day the Imperial Navy destroyed his pirate ship prison marked the end of his silent torment.

traits.locale_text: Abel Haneumann ismini taşıyan birim Pasqal'ı takip etmedi. Büyük hedefler peşindeki yoldaşı tarafından artık ihtiyaç duyulmadığı için bir kenara atıldı. Abel, Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyonuna giderken korsanlar tarafından ele geçirildi ve bir teknomaton olarak çalışmaya zorlandı. İmparatorluk Donanması'nın, korsan gemisi hapishanesini yok ettiği gün, onun da sessiz ızdırabından kurtulduğu gün oldu.
